#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define ll long long int
#define s(x) scanf("%d", &x)
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld", &x)

int lcs(int p, int q, char x[], char y[])
{
    int dp[p+1][q+1], i, j;
    memset(dp, 0, sizeof(dp));
    for (i = 1; i <= p; i++) {
        for (j = 1; j <= q; j++) {
            if (x[i-1] == y[j-1])
                dp[i][j] = 1+dp[i-1][j-1];
            else
                dp[i][j] = max(dp[i-1][j], dp[i][j-1]);
        }
    }
    return dp[p][q];
}

int main()
{
    int t, p, q, u = 0;
    s(t);
    while (t--) {
        s(p);
        s(q);
        char x[p+1], y[q+1];
        scanf("%s%s", x, y);
        printf("Case %d: %d\n", ++u, p+q-lcs(p, q, x, y));
    }
    return 0;
}
